spanGrp.span: We are Christians and we go to the church.
bizım halh bizım halh khristiandır kissäya gidirıh
Ajarians are Muslims and they do not go to the church.
onnar ajarlar ajarlar musurmandır kissäya getmirlär onnar šei
3.SG.M.NOM -PL Adzharian -PL Adzharian -PL muslim:SG.M.NOM -EPST.COP church -DAT go -NEG -AOR -PL 3.SG.M.NOM -PL that
We go to the church and light candles.
biz kissäya gidirıh mum yahirıh šei edirıh
1.PL church -DAT go -AOR -1.PL candle light -AOR -1.PL that do -AOR -1.PL
We differ from them, they have their heads covered, and they walk unwashed.
bizlär airlanirıh onnardan onnar bašlari bağli gäzirlär kirli_mirli
We are clean and more civilized than them.
biz pak tämız gäzirıh kulturni čem onnar
And we have our traditions that Urums had before.
biz bizım adätınän gidirıh äväldän näsıl urumlar aa gidirdılär bizdä o ädätınän gidirıh
1.PL 1.PL -GEN tradition -INSTR go -AOR -1.PL before how Urum -PL HESIT go -AOR -PST -PL 1.PL -LOC that custom -INSTR go -AOR -1.PL
Ajarians have other traditions, their own Muslim traditions.
onnarda ajarlarda gändi ädätläriinän giderlär özgä musurmanski abičai gidirlär
3.SG.M.NOM -PL -and Adzharian -PL -and own custom -PL -POSS.3 -INSTR go -IPFV -PL other muslim:SG.M.NOM tradition:SG.M.NOM go -AOR -PL
Well so we differ from them.
ištem ämbelä airlaniirıh onnardan biz aa
